loadThumbnail

public boolean loadThumbnail(IconDownloadListener listener)
Load the thumbnail of the user who posted this score, asynchronize call,none-blocking, the listener will be called back when the request is done pass in the IconDownloadListener to get the result of the request.

Returns:
return false means the request could not fulfill(no listener,network error,permission error, etc).

loadSmallThumbnail

public boolean loadSmallThumbnail(IconDownloadListener listener)
Load the small thumbnail of the user who posted this score, asynchronize call, non-blocking, the listener will be called back when the request is done pass in the IconDownloadListener to get the result of the request.

Returns:
return false means the request could not fulfill(no listener,network error,permission error, etc).

loadHugeThumbnail

public boolean loadHugeThumbnail(IconDownloadListener listener)
Load the large thumbnail of the user who posted this score, asynchronize call, non-blocking, the listener will be called back when the request is done pass in the IconDownloadListener to get the result of the request.

Returns:
return false means the request could not fulfill(no listener,network error,permission error, etc).
